Eh, from the time of the cold war Washington's propaganda machine continues to report for the world about US' leadership of powerful solving of global problem. Americans think that they only could care about world fate and assign 'bad' and 'good' guys in the world. This American myth of cold war was destroy by was in Afghanistan and Iraq where Americans couldn't get necessary results because of US troops stick in war against local rebels! But the main that Pentagon didn't realize main point of war - the retention of thrilled territories! Not only that Americans can't realize this task but the aim of total control over country what is contradict with wishes of local population to get independent! As a result of it USA has many problems in Iraq and Afghanistan!
